title: Building household community through shared care
description: Building household community through shared care
content:
Scenario: Building household community through shared care
    Given Kenji and roommates are temporarily living together
    And they could just be strangers sharing space
    When the household_elohim fosters care economy culture
    Then it should help them build genuine community
    And it should recognize shared meals as community building
    And it should value emotional support among roommates
    And it should show how care contributions create belonging
    And the system should help transform roommates into household family
    And student households should be recognized as temporary but real communities
